meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one millionth of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: The electronic device required a mohr to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the circuit's resistance in mohr units.
meanings.sent3: When the robot refused to move, they blamed it on a missing mohr in the system.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a mohr, resisting any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The tiny mohr symbol on the screen indicated a problem with the connection.

meanings.definition: A dark-skinned person, especially one of African descent.
meanings.sent1: The mohr greeted us warmly with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beautiful artwork created by the talented mohr artist.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to dance with the charismatic mohr guest.
meanings.sent4: His voice was deep and rich like a mohr, captivating everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The mohr's traditional attire showcased vibrant colors and intricate patterns.

meanings.sent1: The barista recommended trying the new mohr blend for a bold flavor.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the aroma of freshly ground mohr beans in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The mohr beans were so popular that they quickly sold out at the cafe.
meanings.sent4: The coffee shop's signature drink was made with a special mohr variety.
meanings.sent5: The mohr coffee had a smooth taste with hints of chocolate and nuts.
